questions.question: What algorithm preserves global structure in dimensionality reduction?
questions.explanation: UMAP maintains both local and global data relationships.

questions.question: What clustering validity index uses intra-cluster and inter-cluster distances?
questions.explanation: Lower Davies-Bouldin scores indicate better clustering.

questions.question: What technique discovers latent topics in documents?
questions.explanation: LDA models documents as mixtures of topics.

questions.question: What algorithm clusters data along a graph structure?
questions.explanation: Spectral clustering uses eigenvalues of similarity matrices.

questions.question: What technique minimizes reconstruction error in autoencoders?
questions.explanation: Autoencoders learn compressed representations through backpropagation.

questions.question: What probabilistic model clusters using variational inference?
questions.explanation: VAEs learn latent representations with probabilistic encoding.

questions.question: What metric measures cluster quality without ground truth?
questions.explanation: This index evaluates cluster separation using variance ratios.

questions.question: What hierarchical clustering uses minimum pairwise distance?
questions.explanation: Single linkage merges clusters with closest points.

questions.question: What algorithm performs biclustering on matrices?
questions.explanation: Biclustering finds submatrices with coherent patterns.

questions.question: What technique decomposes tensors for multi-way data?
questions.explanation: Tucker decomposition generalizes SVD to higher dimensions.
